typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as short,
		name as string,
		dept as string,
		startdate as date 'MM/dd/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['2021/*.csv']) ~> csv
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		dept as string,
		isactive as string,
		startdate as date,
		enddate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sql
sql select(mapColumn(
		sql_id = id,
		sql_name = name,
		sql_dept = dept,
		sql_isactive = isactive,
		sql_startdate = startdate,
		sql_enddate = enddate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameCols
ExistsOrNot select(mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		dept,
		startdate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropSQLCols
DropSQLCols derive(isactive = 1,
		EndDate = '12/31/9999') ~> makeitactive
RenameCols derive(hashref = md5(sql_id,sql_name,sql_dept)) ~> hashsql
csv derive(hashinput = md5(id,name,dept)) ~> hashcsv
hashcsv, hashsql exists(hashinput == hashref,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsOrNot
hashsql, hashcsv exists(hashref == hashinput,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 derive(sql_isactive = '0',
		sql_enddate = currentDate('MM/dd/YYYY')) ~> makeitinactive
makeitinactive alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
makeitactive sink(input(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		dept as string,
		isactive as string,
		startdate as date,
		enddate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		dept,
		startdate,
		enddate = EndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		dept as string,
		isactive as string,
		startdate as date,
		enddate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['sql_id'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		isactive = sql_isactive,
		enddate = sql_enddate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
